name: Revolution Toad: Double CD Pack
description:
The year is 24889. The world is a police state. You are Revolution Toad. And you are on the road.
To justice.

Critically acclaimed [citation needed] hit game of the decade [citation also needed]: REVOLUTION TOAD is BACK [it's brand new wtf are you talking about] in your CYBER SPACE with this combination deal of a dual double CD combination PACK.

Play the CLASSIC Revolution Toad 1 levels (Translated to English for your convenience) BACK TO BACK with the world renowned REVOLUTION TOAD II: WORLD TOUR combined into ONE SINGLE .exe CYBERFILE.

SMASH the WASD keys to control REVOLUTION TOAD (French AZERTY toggle included), look around with the MOUSE and DESTROY FASCISM AND CAPITALISM!

And then BUY MERCH <3

PLAY NOW and SAVE THE WORLD!

Ctrl-Right + Ctrl-Left + Spacebar to reset all progress.

HTML5 Version:https://yannic.itch.io/revolution-toad-html
